entry.heading: Moulding stucco promptly
entry.block: Crush and pulverize finely brick or Armenian bole or sanguine and incorporate it with melted wax, and thus melted, cast like the others on a relief medal, and so you will have a hollow mold where you will be able to cast ground paper or cimolee.
Finely sieved brick is better, since bole is too fat
